name: Adeptinfosys
overview:
AdeptInfosys is dedicated to provide IT professional services and solutions. We specialize in Technical Training, Strategic consulting, Application development, e-business and Staffing solutions for long term service delivery excellence in a complex IT environments. We are extremely focused, technically savy and value based. We integrate intelligence and innovation to incorporate people, processes to arrive at dynamic solutions to meet your business challenges and bring in positive return on your investment.

AdeptInfosys, training was formed in the view of the ever growing demands of the market, for the skilled manpower in high end technologies like , MVC, Android, Window Phone, Web Designing, Asp.Net, WCF, WPF, PHP, SEO, Java, J2EE, web logic server administration, Websphere, Cognos 8.4,SAP-ABAP , Testing Tools Course ,.NET, Spring, Shell Scripting, Hibernate, Oracle10g DBA, Sql Server Etc to name a few. In a short span of time we achieved tremendous success in motive of leveraging successfull careers by bridging the gap between Academics to Industry.

Software Training Online offers job oriented training programs by industry experts, our training courses are aimed at fresh graduates, pass outs or experienced IT Professionals who want to switch into software industry. our Testing Tools training program covers every thing from fundamentals to sufficiently advanced concept to make a person confidant enough to enter the world of Quality testing. Not only our Testing Tools course makes one learn about the concepts and methodologies, but also efficient means of employing the software tools. Students who complete Testing Tools course get opportunity to work as Quality assurance engineers, performance engineers, Software testers and technical managers with various organizations after completing our Testing Tools training course.
